author: Nia Warfield
title: Friday, 27
text:
The " Fast Money " traders shared their first moves for the market open.
Tim Seymour is a buyer of Embraer S.A .
Karen Finerman is a buyer of Intel .
Dan Nathan is a buyer of Microsoft .
Guy Adami is a buyer of Macy's
Trader disclosure: On April 26, 2018, the following stocks and commodities mentioned or intended to be mentioned on CNBC's "Fast Money" were owned by the "Fast Money" traders: Tim Seymour is long AMZA, ACB.TO, APC, APH.TO, BABA, BAC, BX, C, CCJ, CLF, CMG, CRON, CSCO, CX, DAL, DPZ, DVYE, EEM, ERJ, EUFN, EWM, FB, FXI, GE, GILD, GM, GOOGL, GWPH, HAL, INTC, JD, LEAF, MAT, MCD, MO, MOS, MPEL, PAK, PHM, PYPL, RH, RL, SBUX, SQ, T, TIF, TWTR, UA, UAL, VALE, VIAB, VOD, X, XLE, XRT, YNDX, 700.HK. Tim is short IWM, RACE, SPY. Karen Finerman's firm is long ANTM, C, FB, FL, FNAC, GOOG, GOOGL, GLNG, GMLP, INTC, JPM, JPM calls, KORS puts, LYV, SPY puts, SPY put spreads, WIFI. Her firm is short ESRX, IWM, VRX calls. Karen Finerman is long AAL, BAC, BOT Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, C, DAL, DVYE, DXJ, EEM, EPI, EWW, EWZ, DVYE, FB, FL, GM, GMLP, GLNG, GOGO, GOOG, GOOGL, INTC, JPM, LYV, KFL, KORS, KORS calls, KORS puts, MA, MAT puts, MTW, SEDG, SPY puts, TACO, WIFI, WFM. Karen Finerman is short TBT calls. Bitcoin and Ethereum are in her kids' Trust. Dan Nathan is short IWM, SPY. Guy Adami is long CELG, EXAS, GDX, INTC. Guy Adami's wife, Linda Snow, works at Merck.
